sentences.original: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog while the sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky

sentences.original: Artificial intelligence systems can process vast amounts of data and identify complex patterns with remarkable accuracy and efficiency

metadata.description: Different sentences with progressive error rates from 0% to 50%
metadata.purpose: Test how error rate affects translation quality across different semantic domains and sentence structures
